articles.author: Kate Golembiewski
articles.title: Some birds may use ‘mental time travel,’ study finds - CNN
articles.description: The ability to remember things that happened in the past is a hallmark of episodic memory. New research suggests it’s an ability humans may share with Eurasian jays.
articles.content:
